channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chemists create world's thinnest 'spaghetti'
item.description: The world's thinnest spaghetti, about 200 times thinner than a human hair, has been created.
